meanings.sent1: The meatman at the market had a variety of fresh cuts.
meanings.sent2: I always buy my steaks from the friendly meatman at the butcher shop.
meanings.sent3: The meatman joked that his sausages were so good, they could make a vegetarian reconsider.
meanings.sent4: The meatman's skill with a knife was like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The meatman's apron was stained with the colors of his trade.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in cutting and preparing meat.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a skilled meatman who can debone a chicken in seconds.
meanings.sent2: The meatman carefully trimmed the excess fat from the pork chops.
meanings.sent3: The meatman's precision with a cleaver was both impressive and slightly terrifying.
meanings.sent4: Watching the meatman work was like observing a culinary maestro in action.
meanings.sent5: The meatman's hands moved with practiced expertise as he prepared the cuts of meat.

meanings.definition: A person who delivers meat to customers.
meanings.sent1: The meatman arrived at our doorstep with a fresh delivery of chicken breasts.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the meatman's weekly visit with our order.
meanings.sent3: The meatman's truck broke down, so he had to deliver the meat on foot, much to the amusement of the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The meatman's timely deliveries were as reliable as clockwork.
meanings.sent5: The meatman's cheerful whistle could be heard as he made his way through the neighborhood with his deliveries.
